string_data: check failed - The article contains several plausibility issues: (1) The first image shows people posing cheerfully outdoors, which doesn't match the context of convicted activists receiving record jail sentences; (2) The article lacks proper journalistic attribution for key claims about infiltrating meetings and having a whistleblower contact the reporter; (3) The narrative jumps abruptly between the sentencing and the backstory without clear transitions; (4) The tone is overly dramatic and self-congratulatory ("victorious bid," "Hollywood thriller") which is inappropriate for mainstream UK news reporting on court proceedings.
